Detailed Description

template<class Product, class Output = Product *, class Arg = void>
template<class Ty>
class TREX::utils::XmlFactory< Product, Output, Arg >::declare< Ty >

Producer declaration.

Template Parameters:
Ty concrete type of the product

This class is a producer for the XmlFactory allowing the creation of Ty instances.

Precondition:
Ty derives from Product
Ty has a constructor that accepts XmlFactory::argument_type as argument.
See also:
class Factory::declare

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class Product , class Output = Product *, class Arg = void>
template<class Ty>
TREX::utils::XmlFactory< Product, Output, Arg >::declare< Ty >::declare ( Symbol const &  id  )  [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
[in] id An identifier

Creates a new instance and register it to the XmlFactory with the identifier id

Precondition:
id has not been already declared in the XmlFactory
Exceptions:
MultipleFactoryDecl id is alreaduy in use in the XmlFactory
